timeline.bodyText: Nit: I think you can write the message like this "...for " + group + " ...", because if you leave it like it is now, the final message will be with duplicate "group" word.
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.message:
Set login as argument of base group members query in structure sync

 - replace short name of group by its login in query for sub-groups of
 base group while setting members query attribute
 - the main identification of group is now its login, not name
